MinEntropy - Class in bham.leakiest.infotheory
This is a library of useful information theory definitions related to min-entropy-based information measure.

minEntropyLeakConfidenceIntervalVajda(double[], double[][], int, int[], int) - Static method in class bham.leakiest.infotheory.MinEntropy
Calculates the lower bound of the confidence interval of the estimated min-entropy leakage using information-theoretic bounds presetend in [Vajda'02] & [Dutta, Goswami'10].
